amendment.description: To establish the Sense of the Congress that any vacancy in the position of Inspector General of the Federal Housing Finance Agency should be filled in compliance with the Federal Vacancies Reform Act of 1998.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1785 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1785 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Boozman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1785 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1785 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Boozman.
